title: Authorizes and directs the department of health to study potential health hazards from exposure to radio frequency energy emitted from cellular telephone towers
summary: Authorizes and directs the department of health to study potential health hazards from exposure to radio frequency energy emitted from cellular telephone towers and facilities.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the department of health to study potential health hazards from exposure to radio frequency energy emitted from cellular telephone towers and facilities
